item.title: Democrats Can Thank Themselves for the ‘Preemptive Pardon’ Histrionics
item.description: It’s not Kash Patel’s schtick that puts them in jeopardy. It’s that they took their shot at Trump, missed, and now have to worry about the oldest rule...

item.title: Where Trump Can Begin to Undo Biden’s Weaponization of the Government
